definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
real-valued (math.)/taking real numbers as values (of a function)

sentences.english: The new sequences can be used in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 此外新序列在实数中取直，因此更加实用。

sentences.english: Or if you want to think of it as a real number.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想去考虑实数的问题。

sentences.english: In most modern programming environments, dates are stored as real numbers.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数现代程序开发环境中，日期被存为实数。

sentences.english: If field width is smaller than the number of digit, it will display ONE decimal places.
sentences.chinese: 如果栏宽小过实数的数位，便会显示一个小数位。

sentences.english: The acceptability of real number system depends on practice.
sentences.chinese: 实数系统的可接受性依赖于实践。

sentences.english: A real-valued multi-population genetic algorithm with mixing operation has been proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种带融合操作的实数多种群遗传算法。

sentences.english: Scores can be positive or negative real numbers or integers.
sentences.chinese: 评分可以是正的或者负的整数或实数。

sentences.english: There are contradictions in current theories of real number and ZFC.
sentences.chinese: 现行实数理论与ZFC公理集合论中都有矛盾。

sentences.english: The number nine, being the highest value digit, symbolically represented the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 数字九是最高的实数，也指九五至尊的天子。

sentences.english: Most real numbers can't be stored in just a few bytes of memory.
sentences.chinese: 大多数实数都无法保存在几个字节的内存中。

sentences.english: Finally we prove that well-ordered set and real set both have ordered topological hereditary.
sentences.chinese: 最后证明了良序集和实数集合具有序拓扑遗传性。

sentences.english: Some quadratic equations have no real roots .
sentences.chinese: 某些二次方程没有实数根。

sentences.english: The mistakes in Cantor' Proofs on the uncountability of real number sets were pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 分析了存在于康托实数集合不可数证明中的错误。

sentences.english: Methods of exploring the real number roots of a real coefficient polynomial function are procedurally given.
sentences.chinese: 较程序化地给出了实系数多项式函数实数根的求法。

sentences.english: Truncates a real number to an integer.
sentences.chinese: 实数截尾为整型数，肯定会存在误差的。

sentences.english: Replacing variables with real numbers might help clarify the behavior.
sentences.chinese: 使用实数替换变量可能有助于使这一行为更加清晰。

definition: a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)
derived function/derivative f' of a function f
